trans-unit.source: Provides an interface for design-time access to the HTML markup for a control that is associated with a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段存取控制項設計工具相關聯的控制項的 HTML 標記的介面。

trans-unit.source: The IControlDesignerTag interface is the contract between the control designer and a design host that enables the design host to manipulate the HTML tag at design time.
trans-unit.target: IControlDesignerTag 介面是控制項設計工具和設計主應用程式，可讓設計主應用程式管理設計階段 HTML 標記之間的合約。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the identified attribute on the tag.
trans-unit.target: 擷取上標記的識別屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup for the content of the tag.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的 HTML 標記的標記的內容。

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup for the content of the tag.
trans-unit.target: 標記的內容為 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the complete HTML markup for the control, including the outer tags.
trans-unit.target: 擷取控制項，包括外部標記的完整 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: The outer HTML markup for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制外部的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether or not an attribute or the content of a tag has changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出已變更屬性或標記的內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tag has changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果標記已變更，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified attribute from the tag.
trans-unit.target: 從標記中刪除指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the specified attribute and creates the attribute, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定之屬性的值，並在必要時建立屬性。

trans-unit.source: The attribute name.
trans-unit.target: 屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the HTML markup for the content of the tag.
trans-unit.target: 設定標記的內容的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup for the content of the tag.
trans-unit.target: 標記的內容為 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty*> property of the tag.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty*>標記的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty*>

trans-unit.source: The value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty*> property.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.IsDirty*>
